Quarantine Rules

It is proven that following the quarantine rules: washing hands regularly, wearing masks, and keeping social distance can reduce the spread of the disease. The next step in the preventation of the virus is to be vaccinated so that if you contact it, your risk of dying is much relatively low.

We are in this together. Believe in the best days to come!

1. Wash Hands Regularly.

The majority contracts Covid-19 by touching objects, such as the door handle, the light switch, and the lift buttons that are infected by the disease. Therefore, Washing hands can prevent you from being ill.

2. Wear Masks.

The majority contracts Covid-19 by touching objects, such as the door handle, the light switch, and the lift buttons that are infected by the disease. Therefore, Washing hands can prevent you from being ill.

3. Keep Social Distancing .

The disease cannot spread over 3 meters, as a result, maintaining social distancing is an important step in going back to the old, peaceful days.

4. Get Vaccinated.

Yet, the Vaccination still remains the most important part of safety. If you are eligible, that is, do not have side ailments, you should definitely get a dose of a vaccine.
